content.rendered:
Directed by Tigmanshu Dhulia.

Written by Pramod Singh.

Cast Kunal Kapoor(Maj. Gen. Shah Nawaz Khan). Amit Sadh(Lt. Col. Gurbaksh Singh Dhillon). Mohit Marwah(Col. Prem Kumar Sahgal). Kenneth Desai(BhulaBhai Desai). Mrudula Murali(Captain Lakshmi Swaminathan). Kanwaljeet Singh(Achruram Sahgal (as Kanwaljit Singh)). Kenny Basumatary(Subash Chandra Bose). Vijay Varma(Jamal Kidwai). Richard Bhakti Klein(Judge Advocate F.C.A. Kerin (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Jeeshan Ali(Arjun singh (credit only)). Vikas Bangar(Major). Sanjay Brown(Gandhi). Zachary Coffin(Colonel John Bentley). Rajneet Drall(basant kaur (as Rajneet Kaur)).Navneet Gairola. Kumar Kanchan Ghosh(Asif Ali (as Kanchan Ghosh)). Dinesh Goel(Military army). Jeffrey Goldberg(Hugh Toye). Mark Hannant(Sir Claude Auchinleck). Kristian Hedegaard-Petersen(Jugde).Zakir Hussain.Hikaru Ito. Olamilekan Akanbi Jason(British army). Tauqeer Alam Khan(INA Soldier).Rajesh Khera.Vishwas Kini. Godaan Kumar(Muslim League Leader). Sanjeev Kumar(Neighbour). Rajiv Mishra(Surender Singh). Alexx O’Nell(Col. P. Walsh). Saroj Parida(Manohar). Tanmay Ranjan(Mohd. Nawaz).Anil Rastogi.Sudip Sarangi.Mohommed Ali Shah. Edward Sonnenblick(Lt. Col. Kitson). Abhinav Thapar(Gen. Kiyani). Sanjay Tripathi(Hindi Reporter). Rahul Xavier(Army Soldier)

Language Hindi.

Producers Bala Sms Balasubramanian. Sumit Grover. Gurdeep Singh Sappal. Joga Singh.

Production Rajya Sabha Televisio. Tigmanshu Dhulia Film.
